name: Flip N Chop
description:
Controls

It supports 4 gamepads- I know Xbox controllers work(was designed for generic NES USB gamepads)

Two players works with a single keyboard as well-

P1 - Move = WASD K= flip L=chop

P2 - Move= Arrow keys numpad2= Flip Numpad3= Chop

AFTER CHOOSING PLAYERS PRESS THE Y KEY TO START THE GAME

Esc - restart

Q - Quit

You can report any bugs/feature requests for future versions by using this form

http://goo.gl/forms/N9CjcntqvZjDkPHZ2

Thx!

CREDITS-

Game dev, sound fx, animation and all that by M dot Strange

Music by: Sheldon Callahan, Landon Callahan

Art assets by Synty Studios

This game was made especially for the 2016 SubZero street art festival in San Jose, California.
